title: Crime Alert 08.21.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.21.19
description:
90 year-old man confesses to cop he killed his wife. Woman gets mad, tries to kill would-be lover after he falls asleep. Wife assaults husband over going to church and hidden marijuana.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
